H0.text: Hydrogen is the other element that all biochemical molecules have along with oxygen and carbon.

H1.text: Helium is the other element found in all biochemical molecules alongside oxygen and carbon.

H2.text: Nitrogen is the other element that, along with oxygen and carbon, is present in all biochemical molecules.

H3.text: Calcium is the other element that all biochemical molecules contain, along with oxygen and carbon.

A4.text: Hydrogen is part of a wide range of substances, including water, hydrocarbons, and numerous other organic compounds.
